column2: "Na kyɛfa a otsia ebien no bae maa Simeonmba ebusuakuw no dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee: nye hɔn egyapadze wɔ Judamba egyapadze no mu."
"Na dza wonyae yɛɛ hɔn egyapadze nye Beer-seba
"Hazar-sual
"Eltolad
"Ziklag
"Bɛt-lebaot
column3: nye Saruhen; nkurow duebiasa ɔnye no nkuraase:"

column2: "Ain
column5: nye Asan; nkurow anan ɔnye no nkuraase:"

column2: "nye nkuroba a ɔdeda nkurow yi ho hyia nyinara dze kodu Baalat-beer
column3: Pomu afamu Rama. Iyi nye Simeonmba ebusuakuw egyapadze dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee."

column2: "Judamba afamu dze no mu na Simeonmba egyapadze fi: osiandɛ Judamba kyɛpɛn no dɔɔ so dodow ma hɔn: dɛm ntsi Simeonmba nyaa egyapadze wɔ hɔn egyapadze no mu."
"Na kyɛfa a otsia ebiasa no bae maa Zebulunmba dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee: na hɔn egyapadze ne he okodu Sarid:"
"na hɔn he fow kɔ anee afamu
column4: na okodu Dabbeset; dze kodu ɔwora no a ɔwɔ Jokmeam enyim no;"

column2: "na ɔdze dan fi Sarid boka afamu wɔ wipuei afamu dze kodu Kislɔt-tabor (Kislɔt-tabor) he do: na ofir edzi kɔ Daberat
"na hɔ na ofi kotwa mu wɔ boka afamu dze kɔ Gath-hefer dze kɔ Et-kazin; na ofir edzi wɔ Rimmon a ɔtsen dze kɔ Nea;"
"na ɔhe no dan fa ho wɔ kwaamu afamu dze kɔ Hannaton: na n’edzifir wɔ Ifta-el ɔbɔn no mu;"
"nye Katat
column6: nye Bɛtlɛhɛm: nkurow duebien nye no nkuraase."

column2: "Iyi nye Zebulunmba egyapadze dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee
"Kyɛfa a otsia anan no bae maa Isakarmba no dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee."
"Na hɔn he kodu Jezreel
"Hafaraim
"Rabit
"Remet
"na ɔhe no dze kodu Tabor
column4: nye Bɛt-semes; nye hɔn he a n’edzifir wɔ Jordan; nkurow duesia ɔnye no nkuraase."

column2: "Iyi nye Isakarmba ebusuakuw egyapadze dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee
"Na kyɛfa a otsia enum no bae maa Asermba ebusuakuw dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee."
"Na hɔn he nye Helkat
"Allam-melek
column3: Amad nye Misal; na ɔdze kodu Karmel anee afamu

column2: "na ɔdze dan wipuei afamu kɔ Bɛt-dagon na okodu Zebulun
column3: nye Ifta-el ɔbɔn mu wɔ kwaamu afamu dze kɔ Bɛt-emek nye Neiel; na ofir edzi kɔ Kabul wɔ bankum afamu

column2: "na ɔhe no dan kɔ Rama
column3: na okodu Taere kurow a wɔagye ho ban no; na ɔsan dan kɔ Hosa; na n’edzifir wɔ Akizib mbew ho po no ho:"

column2: "Umma so
column4: nye Rehob: nkurow eduonu ebien ɔnye no nkurobaase."

column2: "Iyi nye Asermba ebusuakuw egyapadze dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee
"Kyɛfa a otsia esia no bae maa Naftalimba no dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee."
"Na hɔn he fi Zaanannim esudur no ho
column4: nye Jabneel dze kɔ Lakum; na n’edzifir wɔ Jordan:"

column2: "na ɔhe no dan fa anee afamu kɔ Aznoth-tabor
column3: na ɔdze fi hɔ pue Hukok; na okodu Zebulun wɔ pomu afamu
column4: na okodu Aser wɔ anee afamu
column5: na okodu Juda wɔ Jordan wipuei afamu."

column2: "Na nkurow a wɔagye ho ban no nye Zidim
"Adama
"Kedes
"Iron
column6: nye Bɛt-semes; nkurow duakron ɔnye no nkuraase."

column2: "Iyi nye Naftalimba ebusuakuw egyapadze dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee."
"Kyɛfa a otsia esuon no bae maa Danmba ebusuakuw dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee."
"Na hɔn egyapadze he nye Zora
"Saalabbin
"Elon
"Elteke
"Jehud
"Me-jarkon
column4: na ɔhe no a ɔwɔ Jopa tsentsendo no."

column2: "Na Danmba hɔn he no fir edzi tra hɔn: osiandɛ Danmba no fowee kɔree nye Lesem kɔkoe
column8: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egya Dan ne dzin tse."

column2: "Iyi nye Danmba ebusuakuw egyapadze dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee
"Na wowiee asaase no kyɛ dze yɛɛ egyapadze dɛ mbrɛ n’ahe no tsetsee no; na Israelmba no dze egyapadze bi maa Nun ne babanyin Josua wɔ hɔn mu:"
"dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE mbrasɛm tse no na wɔdze kurow a obisae no maa no
column3: mekyerɛ Timnat-sera wɔ Efraim nkokodo nkurow no mu: na ɔkyekyeer kurow no

column2: "Iyi nye egyapadze a ɔsɔfo Eleazar
column4: nye Israelmba ebusuakuw ebusuakuw mu egyanom efiefi etsitsir no
column5: nam tontotwe do kyɛe wɔ Siloh wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column6: wɔ ehyiadzibuw no n’abowano. Na wowiee asaase no mu kyɛ."
